body_html: @lizaigaoge550 Is this still an issue?. By interpreting the error message, workaround for this will be to convert your data type to float.32. This can be done by using tf.cast function https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/cast
body_text: @lizaigaoge550 Is this still an issue?. By interpreting the error message, workaround for this will be to convert your data type to float.32. This can be done by using tf.cast function https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/cast
body: @lizaigaoge550 Is this still an issue?. By interpreting the error message, workaround for this will be to convert your data type to float.32. This can be done by using tf.cast function https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/cast
